quizzes.title: Air Quality Management
quizzes.description: Understanding and maintaining air quality in enclosed spaces

questions.question_text: What is the ideal oxygen level for a bunker environment?
questions.explanation: Normal atmospheric oxygen levels are 20.9%. Levels below 19% can cause hypoxia.

questions.question_text: CO2 levels above 1000 PPM indicate poor ventilation.
questions.explanation: CO2 levels above 1000 PPM indicate inadequate ventilation and can cause drowsiness.

quizzes.title: Radiation Detection
quizzes.description: Identifying and responding to radiation threats

questions.question_text: What radiation level requires immediate evacuation?
questions.explanation: Levels above 100 µSv/h require immediate protective action.

questions.question_text: What is the primary function of a HEPA filter?
questions.explanation: HEPA filters remove 99.97% of particles 0.3 microns or larger.
